Package com.testpaper.service

Interface TestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TestServicesImpl
public interface TestService
The TestService interface defines the contract for performing operations related to tests. It provides methods for adding a test, updating a test, retrieving tests, and deleting tests. Additionally, it includes methods for retrieving the count of quizzes and getting tests of a specific subject.
See Also:
